recipe.title: Mixed Greens with Mustard Dressing
ingredients: 6 cups frisée, torn into bite-size pieces
2 large heads of Belgian endive, cut crosswise into 1/2-inch strips
instructions: Whisk vinegar, mustard, shallot, and garlic in small bowl. Gradually whisk in oil. Season dressing with salt and pepper.
Toss frisée and all remaining ingredients in large bowl. Add dressing; toss to coat. Season with salt and pepper.
